articles.title: Voyager customer lost $1 million saved over 24 years and is one of many now desperate to recoup funds - CNBC
articles.description: Voyager Digital had 3.5 million customers, and many are now doing everything they can to try and get some of their money back.
articles.content:
During a five-hour Chapter 11 bankruptcy hearing earlier this month for crypto firm Voyager Digital, a customer named Magnolia was the first user to step forward and speak about her experience.
